rules.name: autoTrade
rules.description: Use dispenser to auto trade with villager
extras: If EMERALD_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade once
If DIAMOND_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade all
Trade offer depend on redstone power.

rules.name: avoidAnvilTooExpensive
rules.description: Allow anvil level cost above 40 (If the client is not installed mod, it will be too expensive but can be used in practice).

rules.name: creativePlayerNoDirectKillArmorStand
rules.description: Creative Player No Direct Kill ArmorStand.

rules.name: dispenserCollectXp
rules.description: Dispenser use bottle to collect xp.

rules.name: dispenserFixIronGolem
rules.description: Dispenser can fix iron golem.

rules.name: emptyShulkerBoxStack
rules.description: Empty shulker boxes stack
extras: empty shulker boxes can stack in a player's inventory or hand
empty shulker boxes will not stack in other inventories, such as chests or hoppers

rules.name: flippingTotemOfUndying
rules.description: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding Totem Of Undying
extras: Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped
When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is empty will flip block
When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is not empty, will place flipped block

rules.name: forceRestock
rules.description: Use spectral arrow to shoot villager to force restock.

rules.name: gravestone
rules.description: place gravestone after player dead.

rules.name: pcaDebug
rules.description: pcaDebug mode

rules.name: pcaSyncPlayerEntity
rules.description: Which player entity can be sync
extras: BOT: carpet bot will be sync
OPS: carpet bot will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
OPS_AND_SELF: carpet bot and self data will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
EVERYONE: everyone's player entity will be sync

rules.name: pcaSyncProtocol
rules.description: Support sync entity and blockEntity from server

rules.name: playerOperationLimiter
rules.description: One tick player can place 2 block, insta break 1 block, can't do it at the same tick

rules.name: playerSit
rules.description: Player can sit down when fast sneak 3 times.

rules.name: potionRecycle
rules.description: Dispenser can clear potion to  cauldron.

rules.name: powerfulBoneMeal
rules.description: Allow use bone meal in cactus, sugar cane, chorus flower.

rules.name: quickLeafDecay
rules.description: quick leaf decay

rules.name: renewableNetheriteEquip
rules.description: Only in nether, throw the diamond equipment with 1 durability to lava fluid to get netherite equipment.

rules.name: sleepingDuringTheDay
rules.description: World will switch to night when player sleep during the day.

rules.name: spawnBiome
rules.description: spawn biome

rules.name: spawnYMax
rules.description: spawn Y Max, 114514 to close

rules.name: spawnYMin
rules.description: spawn Y Min, 114514 to close

rules.name: superLead
rules.description: Leash villagers and mobs by lead.

rules.name: trackItemPickupByPlayer
rules.description: When item pick up by player, item will freeze.

rules.name: useDyeOnShulkerBox
rules.description: Dyes can be used on shulker boxes, empty potion will clean color

rules.name: villagersAttractedByEmeraldBlock
rules.description: Villagers are attracted by emerald block.

rules.name: xaeroWorldName
rules.description: set xaero world name to sync word id to xaerominimap, "#none" is disable.
